nodes.bodyText: The X-Forwarded-Prefix header config support is something new. Some ingress proxies (e.g. nginx) generates this header when they remove a prefix in the request's path to keep the original info. However, you have special cases like envoy which it use another header, x-envoy-path if I am not in mistake, for the same purpose. Hence, I let this header "configurable".
